docs.snippet: The agent published posts before the election that suggested she would prefer to go to jail rather than take a “bullet” for Donald J. Trump, a newspaper reported.

headline.main: Secret Service Investigates Denver Agent After Facebook Posts

docs.snippet: Being silenced, or being one of the few women in the room, can be both inhibiting and enraging.
